posts.caption: wired.com
posts.description: Today Google launched one of its coolest doodles yet: a 3-D interactive Rubik's Cube. Built thanks to advances in CSS and a few smart design tricks, it's one of the most challenging doodles the company has done so far.

posts.message:
RIP Global Assembly Cache (RIP Strong Naming as well)

RT @Meligy: "@nikmd23: R.I.P. Global Assembly Cache. http://t.co/37V85gurOG"
posts.caption: ripgac.net
posts.description: On May 13th, 2014, family and friends of the Microsoft .NET Global Assembly Cache announced that it is losing its long battle with runaway bloat, and has gone into a coma from which it is unlikely to recover.

posts.message: Git Clean command is your friend for cleaning big repositories.
posts.caption: kernel.org
posts.description: Runs a number of housekeeping tasks within the current repository, such as compressing file revisions (to reduce disk space and increase performance) and removing unreachable objects which may have been created from prior invocations of git add.
